title: FM lays wreath at Ismoil Somoni memorial in Dushanbe
content:
DUSHANBE (Tajikistan), March 31 (APP): Foreign Minister Shah Mahmood Qureshi on Wednesday visited the Ismoil Somoni monument in Dushanbe to pay homage to Father of the Tajiks.
The foreign minister laid a wreath at the memorial of Ismoil Somoni, the great Tajik ruler. Foreign Secretary Sohail Mahmood, Pakistan’s ambassador in Dushanbe Imran Haider and senior officials were present.
Privileged to end my visit to Tajikistan by paying homage to the Monument of Ismoil Somoni, Founder of the great Tajik nation.
Thank you to the Government and people of Tajikistan for a great trip.   pic.twitter.com/zFtVLWatPk
— Shah Mahmood Qureshi (@SMQureshiPTI) March 31, 2021
